title: Diamond 4 Support Main LFT

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
In-game Name: Milky (also known as Bounty, Dank, Evil Milky or MilkyAU)
Role: Support
Current Rank: Diamond 4
Top 3 Champions: Thresh, Janna and Lulu
Skype: Yes
Curse: Yes
Facebook: Yes
Twitter: Yes

Hello I'm currently a Diamond 4 Support main in OCE and I'm looking for a team that have high goals and standards and aiming for D5+ within the ranked team. I have a wide range champion pool and I'm able to play flex supports (such as Shen, Naut, etc.) My communication skills are good and I have past shot calling experience from previous teams I was in. So far the highest team I've been in is Diamond 5 and I wish to aim higher than that since the season is close to an end. If you're interested in recruiting me you can always comment below in this thread or add me in-game. I'm currently in the last years of high school so I will not be able to play as frequently due to exams coming up soon within term 4. But as soon as  that is over I'm able to play when ever. As a Diamond 4 Support main I don't really have the best stats on my profile due to the fact I climbed from Gold 5 throughout this whole season, I've had my fair share of playing with players from other parts of the world (massive language barriers), boosted players and toxic gold/plat players.

Thank you for taking your time to read this and I hope I'm the right person you're looking for.

P.S. Don't waste my time if you're just a team that purposely has a low ranked team so they can boost their stats.

replies.body:
Hi Milky, I have a post just before yours about my teams recruiting if you could please read that post: [http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment/8j97RnJc-lfm-team-recruiting-5-more-members-as-alpha-playersreserves
If you wish to join let me know, I personally feel we can reach your expectations.
Thanks

Hi there Milky! I work for Quintessential eSports and we're looking for anyone who is diamond or above and in oce to apply for our pro team! If you think this is something for you and are looking to take your league up to the next level applications are still open at [www.qtesports.com](http://www.qtesports.com) ! We very much hope you apply! <3
- Thanks QTE team
